title: Works great!
comment: Works really well once set up, but it's a little complicated to configure given the modular design. On the other hand, keen to see if some more transports become available thanks to the modular design.
Took a while to get it properly working on my server, and now it's great!

title: Simply awesome!
comment: Took a bit to get the idea of what was happening looking forward to future developments. MMS possibly?
